CreateChatToken.name: CreateChatToken
CreateChatToken.description: Grants permission to create an encrypted token that is used to establish an individual WebSocket connection to a room

CreateLoggingConfiguration.name: CreateLoggingConfiguration
CreateLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a logging configuration that allows clients to record room messages

CreateRoom.name: CreateRoom
CreateRoom.description: Grants permission to create a room that allows clients to connect and pass messages

DeleteLoggingConfiguration.name: DeleteLoggingConfiguration
DeleteLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

DeleteMessage.name: DeleteMessage
DeleteMessage.description: Grants permission to send an event to a specific room which directs clients to delete a specific message

DeleteRoom.name: DeleteRoom
DeleteRoom.description: Grants permission to delete the room for a specified room ARN

DisconnectUser.name: DisconnectUser
DisconnectUser.description: Grants permission to disconnect all connections using a specified user ID from a room

GetLoggingConfiguration.name: GetLoggingConfiguration
GetLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

GetRoom.name: GetRoom
GetRoom.description: Grants permission to get the room configuration for a specified room ARN

ListLoggingConfigurations.name: ListLoggingConfigurations
ListLoggingConfigurations.description: Grants permission to get summary information about logging configurations

ListRooms.name: ListRooms
ListRooms.description: Grants permission to get summary information about rooms

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get information about the tags for a specified ARN

SendEvent.name: SendEvent
SendEvent.description: Grants permission to send an event to a room

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for a resource with a specified ARN

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags for a resource with a specified ARN

UpdateLoggingConfiguration.name: UpdateLoggingConfiguration
UpdateLoggingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

UpdateRoom.name: UpdateRoom
UpdateRoom.description: Grants permission to update the room configuration for a specified room ARN
